instruction: Select the correct words from the text
stem: यह एक उदाहरण वाक्य है।
testing_objective: Assessing knowledge of word selection and comprehension
explanation: The correct selections are 'ह', 'ह', and 'है' as they form meaningful words in the context.
remedial_instruction: Review word selection patterns in Hindi text
misconception_explanation: Students may confuse similar looking characters
